issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
On a iPad splitview app I can’t scroll a WebView completely down to the bottom in landscape mode. Scrolling down, the view is flickering and the last lines are not available.

It works well in portrait mode and also in Titanium 3.1.1
fields.summary: iOS: WebView can’t scroll to bottom

comments.body:
Hi Mario,

Please can you provide a simple reproducible test case that we can drop into an app.js and run?

Also, what do you mean it works in Titanium 3.1.1? You mean it works in the 3.1.1 GA SDK? If that's the case, which SDK does it *not* work in?

Thanks.
